name: Property
description:
Property
is a first person horror online game. Group of people have entered to an restricted area where they meet something unexpected.

Gameplay
1 player is randomly chosen to be a killer and must hunt as many intruders as possible on the property, there can be up to 6 intruders same time trying to escape.

Environments
Different maps you can choose to play. Areas are randomly generated every time a new game starts so nobody can learn the layout before game.

Online
Hosting
- online or lan match
- password
- max players
- map

Searching other games
- quick join for automatically find game for you
- server list for finding games - find all servers or use name search

Controls
Keyboard and mouse, or controller + invert settings
